entries.name: Crippling Wound
entries.effect: The model survives but suffers a permanent injury. -1 Movement.

entries.name: Lost Eye
entries.effect: The model loses an eye. -1 DICE to Ranged Attacks.

entries.name: Shell Shock
entries.effect: The model is shell-shocked. Must pass a Risky roll to activate next game.

entries.name: Mangled Hand
entries.effect: The model's hand is mangled. -1 DICE to Melee Attacks.

entries.name: Deep Wound
entries.effect: The model starts next game with 1 Blood Marker.

entries.name: Captured
entries.effect: The model is captured. Roll again next game - on dead result, model is lost.

entries.name: Bitter Enmity
entries.effect: The model hates the opponent's faction. +1 DICE vs that faction.

entries.name: Hardened
entries.effect: The model is hardened by experience. +1 Armour permanently.

entries.name: Recovering
entries.effect: The model must miss the next game while recovering.

entries.name: Full Recovery
entries.effect: The model makes a full recovery.

entries.name: Full Recovery
entries.effect: The model makes a full recovery.

entries.name: Full Recovery
entries.effect: The model makes a full recovery.

entries.name: Full Recovery
entries.effect: The model makes a full recovery and gains valuable experience.

entries.name: Survived
entries.effect: The model survives and is ready for the next battle.
